name: Rhombus
description:
Rhombus: A game made for the Brackeys 2020.2 Game Jam. 

Tutorial will be in the game shown as levels.

------------------------------------

Controls:   -  - 

  • Move: 'A' & 'D' or left right arrows.
  • Rewind Everything: 'R'.
  • Rewind Objects Only: 'F'.
  • Lock Objects: 'G' then click on the object.
  • Reset Level: 'O'.
  • Open Menu 'i'.

------------------------------------
